title: Bishop of Lincoln arrested on suspicion of sexual assault
summary_full: Church suspends Stephen Conway as police investigate claim man was sexually assaulted between 2018 and 2025The bishop of Lincoln has been arrested on suspicion of sexual assault.Lincolnshire police confirmed that a 68-year-old man was arrested as part of an “ongoing investigation following an allegation that a man was sexually assaulted between 2018 and 2025”. Continue reading...
